channel.title: Hmm
channel.description:
Yeah im bored and will host a server for someone as much as i can.
I have it all set up and my computer is up and ready to go.
I do not run servers that are fully leeched, and nooby.. This just leads to depression...
A bit about my self.
My name is James and I have done RS2 Coding for a few years. I have made some servers which you may not remember, it was a long time ago. They were; Ancients Pk (Not Ancient Pk), FirePhoenixScape, Seascape V1, V2 & V4 and another one I cannot remember. I am a good coder and can help fix problems. I also am in the RSC (Runescape Classic) Community and help/code RSC things aswell as Play RSC Servers.
I am here to host for you for free on a no-ip host. If you would like me to host for you; I suggest you add my Msn Email Address @ james.nye@hotmail.com
I am only letting 1 person in. If you want to rant about it, go ahead idc. But you must give me info about your server so i know what I'm hosting and It has to be a server which people Will play, I am not hosting a server which know one will play.
Thanks,
